org.bytedeco.cpython

Class python

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.cpython.python

  • @Properties(inherit=python.class,value={@Platform(executablepath="/usr/bin/",executable="python3.6"),@Platform(value="macosx",executablepath="/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.6/bin/",executable="python3.6"),@Platform(value="windows",executablepath="C:/Program Files/Python36/",executable="python")})
public class python
extends Object
    With this class, we can extract easily the python program ready for execution. For example, we can print the module search path from Java in a portable fashion this way: 
    
     String python = Loader.load(org.bytedeco.cpython.python.class);
     ProcessBuilder pb = new ProcessBuilder(python, "-m", "site");
     pb.inheritIO().start().waitFor();
    Author:
    Samuel Audet
